p:
Let c represent the number of unreported Ebola cases in a given week and district, and W the number of reported cases. W was assembled from the weekly situation reports of confirmed and probable cases given by the World Health Organization (WHO) [ 25]. The weekly, district-specific reporting rate is then
œÅ =
W
c + W
(1) where the denominator represents the total number of cases, both reported and unreported.
